com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine

Class SpenTextMeasure

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine.SpenTextMeasure

  • public class SpenTextMeasure
extends Object
    This class provides the methods for managing text-related measurements.
    Since:
    3.0.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpenTextMeasure()
      Creates an SpenTextMeasure instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close a SpenTextMeasure instance.
      int getHeight()
      Get the height of the view.
      int getLineCount()
      Get the number of lines in the view.
      int getLineEndIndex(int lineNumber)
      Get the text offset after the last character on the specified line.
      PointF getLinePosition(int lineNumber)
      Get the position of the specified line.
      int getLineStartIndex(int lineNumber)
      Get the text offset at the beginning of the specified line.
      int getMinHeight()
      Get the minimum height of the view.
      RectF getTextRect(int textIndex)
      Get the rect of the smallest rectangle that encloses all the characters.
      boolean setObjectShape(SpenObjectShape objectShape)
      Set the specified shape object.
      boolean setObjectText(SpenObjectShape objectText)
      Set the specified text box object.

        public boolean setObjectShape(SpenObjectShape objectShape)
        Set the specified shape object.
        Parameters:
        objectShape - The shape object.
        Returns:
        true if the shape is successfully set. false if the shape is not set.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if objectShape is null.
        Since:
        4.0.0

      • setObjectText

        public boolean setObjectText(SpenObjectShape objectText)
        Set the specified text box object.
        Parameters:
        objectText - The text box object.
        Returns:
        true if the text box is successfully set. false if the text box is not set.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if objectText is null.
        Since:
        3.0.0
